message: Please review our website at http://www.igobubble.com  Is the website and video effective? igobubble lets you use your phone to leave photos, videos and messages inside living bubbles wherever you go. After you leave, your bubbles stay behind. Bubbles with an Attitude! They grow with interaction and shrink with negligence. Popular bubbles grow, divide, multiply and spread. Unpopular bubbles shrink, wither and pop. Feedback highly appreciated. Applying for TC Disrupt in Sept. Available for free on iPhone App Store.
